statements: UPDATE Show_Schedule SET show_name = 'Morning Show', schedule_time = '2022-12-01 08:00:00' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE Show_Schedule SET schedule_time = '2023-01-15 18:30:00', show_name = 'Evening Show' WHERE show_id = 2;
UPDATE Show_Schedule SET schedule_time = '2022-09-15 18:00:00' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE Show_Schedule SET show_name = 'New Show Name', schedule_time = '2022-09-20 20:30:00' WHERE show_id = 2;
UPDATE ShowSchedule SET show_name='The Morning Show', show_type='Talk Show' WHERE show_id=1;
UPDATE ViewerRatings SET viewer_name='Alice', rating=4.5, comment='Great show!' WHERE rating_id=1;
UPDATE ShowSchedule SET show_name = 'New Show Name', schedule_time = '2022-12-31 00:00:00' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE ViewerRatings SET rating = 4.5, comment = 'Great show!' WHERE show_id = 1 AND viewer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE shows SET show_name = 'New Show Name' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE episodes SET air_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE episode_id = 5;
UPDATE shows SET show_description = 'Updated description' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE episodes SET air_date = '2023-01-15', episode_title = 'Season Finale' WHERE episode_id = 10;
UPDATE show_schedule SET show_name = 'New Show Name' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE viewer_ratings SET rating = 4.5 WHERE viewer_id = 101 AND episode_id = 10;
UPDATE show_schedule SET show_time = '18:00:00' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE viewer_ratings SET rating = 4.5 WHERE episode_id = 10 AND viewer_id = 25;
UPDATE shows SET rating = 8.5 WHERE show_id = 101;
UPDATE viewers SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE viewer_id = 201;
UPDATE shows SET genre='Drama' WHERE show_id = 1;
UPDATE episodes SET duration = '01:30:00' WHERE episode_id = 3;
